data.meta_site_name: FD Whittington Obituary | August 19, 2021 | Reins - Sturdivant Funeral Home - North Wilkesboro, NC
data.text:
Mr. FD Whittington, age 91 of Wilkesboro passed away Thursday, August 19, 2021 at Wake Forest Baptist-Wilkes Medical Center.

Private graveside service will be held at Mountlawn Memorial Park with Pastor Joey Moore officiating.

Mr. Whittington was born April 6, 1930 in Wilkes County to Gordon Pulear and Lillie Reeves Whittington. FD was a simple man, who loved cars and his family.

He was preceded in death by his parents.

He is survived by his wife; Madge Staley Whittington of the home, a son; Randy Whittington of Wilkesboro, grandson; Randy Whittington, II of Fort Mill, SC, a sister; Gerry Trivette of Wilkesboro, a brother; Jim Whittington of North Wilkesboro, a nephew; Roger Whittington of Purlear, a niece; Beverly Gaddy and husband Rick of Wilkesboro.

In lieu of flowers memorials may be made to St. Jude Children’s Research Hospital, 501 St. John Place, Memphis, TN 38105.

Online condolences may be made to www.reinssturdivant.com.
